title: Practice Conditionals
description:
Build a program that uses an if block with multiple elseif blocks to output a letter grade for a given score that is between 1 and 100. Then use the following information to determine the letter grade for the score.

90-100: A
80-89: B
70-79: C
60-69: D
Below 60: F

In this problem, a score of 78 should output the letter grade, C. Change the score to test all of the different program outputs.
hint: Build the conditional by dropping in the if block and adding any elseif's that are needed. Then write the boolean expressions to decide the letter grade for the given score. When you have completed your program test it by changing the score and running the program again.
